channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Alistair Appleton is in his element today as he visits the spectacular Perth and Kinross countryside, on a mission to help a young couple from Edinburgh realise their dream of a new lifestyle in a rural home. Aside from property, a visit to the coast, to learn about one of the world's most advanced wind turbines, leaves Alistair full of hope about the future of the UK's renewable energy.
